title: Adani Energy Solutions arm to form a joint venture with Esyasoft Holdings
description: In a regulatory filing, the company said, ATSFL and EHL would hold a 49% and 51% shareholding, respectively, in the proposed joint venture with equal participation in the company's board of directors.
